start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE},
end_date = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE},

where resume_id = #{resumeId,jdbcType=BIGINT} ${@com.jabava.utils.privilege.AuthorisedPersonUtil@getUserAuthorisedPersonList("person_id")}
